affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表名词, 性质; 状态

word_mean_info__list.difference: 法律用词，指审判后判定有罪，但未作最后判决。
指对案件作出审理判决，但判决内容较笼统，不如sentence和condemn使用广泛。
法律用词，指根据罪犯所犯罪行的轻重而宣判处罚。
书面用词，指郑重他宣判某人有罪。
普通用词，指法院对审理结束的案件做出的定罪判刑。

word_group.brief_definition: 死刑；死刑判决；死亡判决
句子结构；句型结构；句式结构
最长刑期；最高刑罚；最多判处

bilingual.target: 使用了多样的句子开头。

bilingual.source: Ask for volunteers to read out the sentence.
Choose one sentence from above and write.
bilingual.target: 从上面选择一个句子并写下来。

bilingual.source: Vary sentence lengths, with some short sentences for key facts.
bilingual.target: 句子长度要变化，关键事实要用一些短句。

bilingual.source: Connectives can be used to connect clauses within a sentence or to join up separate sentences.
bilingual.target: 连接词可以用来连接句子中的从句或连接独立的句子。

bilingual.source: This is the main sentence that you will go on to develop.
bilingual.target: 这是你将要展开的主要句子。

bilingual.source: Takes the place of a full stop when the sentence is a question.
bilingual.target: 当句子是疑问句时，用来代替句号。

bilingual.source: Commas could be used, but using a semicolon makes the sentence clearer.
bilingual.target: 可以使用逗号，但使用分号使句子更清晰。

bilingual.source: Find and copy a sentence which shows that the time has switched to the past.
bilingual.target: 找出并抄写一句表明时间切换到过去的句子。

bilingual.source: Our English teacher Ms Chen wrote the sentence on the blackboard and said, "Please write this down."
bilingual.target: 我们的英语老师陈老师在黑板上写了这个句子并说：“请把这个写下来。”

list.abstract: sentence（英[ˈsentəns]，美[ˈsentəns]），英语单词，作名词为句子；判决；徒刑。作动词为对…进行宣判。短语搭配有simple sentence（简单句）。例句为“Please translate the underlined sentence into English.（请把划线的句子翻译成英文。）” sentence名词类近义词有award、proposition等，物动词类近义词有determine、adjudge，相关反义词有acquittal。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you kidding me? Can I hear it in a sentence?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？可以造个句子给我吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Even though I totally just used the word "liability" correctly in a sentence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 即使我刚刚在一个句子里准确地使用了"负担"这个词。

yingyinNormal.en: One day he asked a woman who was there how it was going, how did you like the Facebook, She answered with a long and pretty complicated sentence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一天他问一位女性，问她觉得Facebook怎么样，她用一个很长很复杂的句子进行了回答。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: The muscles in my wrist are cramping as I struggle to finish this sentence. Ow, ow, oh, the pain. Love, Sheldon. Fine. And Amy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我忍着用肌肉在抽筋的手腕艰苦地写完这句子。哎哟，哎哟，疼死我了。爱你的谢尔顿敬上。行行行。"谢尔顿与艾米敬上"。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not a death sentence. Your life can continue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不是末日，你的生活还将继续。

yingyinNormal.en: You practiced grammar rules and studied sentence syntax.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你练习过语法规则，研读句法。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's because you're... Wow. I don't know how to finish that sentence, either.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是因为你是... 这句话我也不知道该怎么收尾。

yingyinNormal.en: There was no witness to the actual murder. Otherwise, he'd be serving a life sentence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有目击证人，否则，他就会判终身监禁了。

yingyinNormal.en: And now it is our duty to carry out that sentence before anybody else dies because of him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在是我们的职责在其他人因他而死之前来执行这样的刑罚。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't need to think analytically about verb conjugations, sentence syntax, and so forth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不用分析其中的动词变化或语法等等。

yingyinNormal.en: A life sentence for a rose? I received eternal damnation for one. I merely locking him away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过是朵玫瑰而已啊？我受到了一个永恒的诅咒。我只是把他关起来而已。

yingyinNormal.en: The executive can't legislate, can't receive appropriations, can't sentence people to imprisonment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 行政机关不能立法，不能接受拨款，不能判人入监。

yingyinNormal.en: Ask them if it would be faster if we cut the baby's face off the penis so we could put it on the bunny. That is a weird sentence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果要快点的话，我们可以从“小弟弟”上取出你的照片，再贴到兔子蛋糕上。好像不是很适当。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, Howard does make fun of him a lot. Well, that's not all Howard's fault. I mean, if Raj doesn't want to be made fun of, then I don't know a nice way to finish this sentence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德的确常常吐槽他。那也不全是霍华德的错啊。要是拉杰不想被吐槽，那我不知道要怎么礼貌地结束这句话。

yingyinNormal.en: You clearly weren't listening to my topic sentence: Get your women in line! You make them apologize to Amy and set things right. I am a man of science, not someone's snuggle bunny!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你显然没仔细听我的主题句：管好你们的女人！叫她们去跟艾米道歉，把关系修复好。我是个搞科研的人，不是某人的抱抱兔。

yingyinNormal.en: The court sentences the accused as follows: Rita Beckhart, Caroline Steinhoff, Regina Kroit, Angela Zeva and Andrea Lumen to each serve a total sentence in prison of four years and three months.
yingyinNormal.zh: 判刑结果如下：丽塔·贝克哈特，卡罗琳娜·斯坦霍夫，赫吉娜·克罗伊特，安吉拉·杰瓦以及安德丽娅·鲁门各判处监禁四年零三个月。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group of words that makes a statement, asks a question, or expresses a command, wish, or exclamation

examination_example.sentence: If you're breathing too hard to talk in complete <highlight>sentences</highlight>, back off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你呼吸困难而无法说出完整的句子，先退后一下。

examination_example.sentence: The underlined <highlight>sentence</highlight> most probably shows that the court was contemptuous of McDonnell’s conduct.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下划线的句子最有可能表明法院对McDonnell的行为持轻蔑态度。

examination_example.sentence: You try to reconstruct the likely meanings or effects that any given <highlight>sentence</highlight>, image or reference might have had.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你试图重建任何给定的句子、图像或参考文献可能具有的意义或效果。

sense_info_list.en:
say officially in court that someone is to receive a particular punishment; 
punishment set by a court

examination_example.sentence: He had already <highlight>sentenced</highlight> five or six other defendants only to forced community service on that day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那天，他已经判处另外五六名被告强制社区服务。

sample.mean: adj. 不在的；缺席的；走神的；心不在焉的；缺少的
n. 同意；赞成；准许
v. 不同意；对国教（或东正教教义）不遵循
v. 对…怀恨；怨恨；（resend的过去式和过去分词）
n. 观点；看法；感觉；情感；情绪；感伤；感想；愿望

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表名词, 性质; 状态

word_usage.usage:
sentence表示“宣判；判决”时，为及物动词，可接名词或代词作宾语，还可接以动词不定式充当宾语补足语的复合宾语，常用于被动结构。例：
He has been sentenced to pay a fine of ￡1000.
他被判罚款1000英镑。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 死刑；死刑判决；死亡判决

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group of words that makes a statement, asks a question, or expresses a command, wish, or exclamation

examination_example.sentence: Examine types of <highlight>sentences</highlight> they use, pay attention to their metaphors, and focus on stories you feel you could write a pretty cool sequel to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究他们使用的句子类型，注意他们的隐喻，多留意那些你觉得可以写出很酷的续集的故事上。

examination_example.sentence: They may have been great puzzle-solvers, taking into account higher-level concepts such as whether a single <highlight>sentence</highlight> made sense within an overall story line.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可能是很好的解谜者，会考虑到更高层次的概念，比如一个句子在整个故事线中是否有意义。

examination_example.sentence: If you've ever started a <highlight>sentence</highlight> with, "If I were you... ", there's a scientific reason behind it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你曾经用过“如果我是你 ...”开头的句子，这是有科学根据的。

sense_info_list.en:
say officially in court that someone is to receive a particular punishment; 
punishment set by a court

examination_example.sentence: Becoming separated from the tribe—or worse, being cast out—was a death <highlight>sentence</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与部落分离，或者更糟的是，被赶出部落，是一种死亡判决。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group of words that makes a statement; asks a question; or expresses a command; wish; or exclamation

examination_example.sentence: You can start your essay with the <highlight>sentence</highlight> "Online dictionaries are becoming increasingly popular".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以用“在线词典越来越流行”这句话开始你的文章。

examination_example.sentence: You can start your essay with the <highlight>sentence</highlight> "The use of PowerPoint is becoming increasingly popular in class".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以用“幻灯片的使用在课堂上变得越来越流行”这样的句子开始你的文章。

examination_example.sentence: You can start your essay with the <highlight>sentence</highlight> "The use of translation apps is becoming increasingly popular."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以用这句话开始写你的文章：“翻译应用程序的使用越来越流行。”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group of words that makes a statement, asks a question, or expresses a command, wish, or exclamation

examination_example.sentence: A code uses symbols to replace words, phrases, or <highlight>sentences</highlight>.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: His last <highlight>sentence</highlight> may touch people’s hearts: "I am young, so I can learn to think like an alien."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的最后一句话或许能打动人心:“我还年轻，所以我可以学会像外星人一样思考。”

examination_example.sentence: From the underlined <highlight>sentence</highlight>, we can infer that Mel felt sorry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从划线的句子中，我们可以推断梅尔感到抱歉。

examination_example.sentence: From the underlined <highlight>sentence</highlight>, we can infer (推断) that Yuki wanted to end the conversation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从划线的句子中，我们可以推断出Yuki想结束对话。
